title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When trying to import a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the original image is still displayed.
OB: No observed behavior mentioned in the bug report.
EB: After importing new image1.jpg into the layout again, the expected result is that the new image is displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the layout where the image is displayed.
2. Import a new image (e.g., image1.jpg) into the layout again.
3. Compare the displayed image with the new imported image. The actual result should be that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
